en.title: Amazon is rolling out new shopping features for Alexa+, because of course it is
en.description: The assistant can keep an eye on a certain product and automatically order the item when it's on sale for a price you specify.

en.title: An AI copycat of King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard went unnoticed on Spotify for weeks
en.description: A poster on Reddit said they were recommended what appeared to be an AI-generated copy of one of the band's songs in Spotify’s Release Radar playlist
